eme

Class EnsembleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eme.EnsembleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithmListener, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class EnsembleListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithmListener, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure
    Author:
    Jose M. Moyano: jmoyano@uco.es Class implementing a listener which makes reports for the algorithm.
    See Also:
